New Records: Lockie Ferguson finishes with 3-0, the first bowler at a World Cup to bowl four maidens
Key Match Events: PNG lose early wickets to fall to 14-2, bowled out for 78
Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand opted to bowl first against Papua New Guinea in their rain-delayed Twenty20 World Cup closing match
Rain delayed the toss by an hour, and no overs were lost
Both teams were already eliminated from Super Eight contention in Group C
New Zealand lost to Afghanistan and the West Indies and has beaten only Uganda
PNG has yet to win a game
New Zealand made one change; wrist spinner Ish Sodhi came in for bowling allrounder James Neesham
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain delayed the toss by an hour, and no overs were lost
